message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,300,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its potential worth to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,100,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but I believe my initial offer was already quite competitive.  Could we perhaps agree on a price of $1,225,000?  This allows both of us to benefit from the transaction.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers, so I'm proposing a price of $1,200,000. Can we agree on that?
